title: Mass. officer charged, placed on leave after allegedly strangling relative
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime The Millis Police placed the officer on unpaid administrative leave as the investigation continues.
A Millis Police officer was placed on unpaid leave as he awaits trial on charges of domestic assault and strangulation of a family member.
On Wednesday, Craig Thompson pleaded not guilty to charges of strangulation and assault and battery at his arraignment in Wrentham District Court.
